Text:
eztv stuff is always the best but I really don't like the 699.39 MiB file size for an hour long program. 350 MiB is more than enough and doesn't hog band. There is literally almost no difference in quality between the two sizes. I wish I could encode files but I'm not as good as the people who make the 699 MiB files. Anyway, that's my request... 350 MiB for an hour long prog and not 700.

Much appreciate the hard work you've done just the same, just get a little frustrated sometimes sorry.

Big thank you to eztv for all the excellent torrents and best consistency on the net. 

eztv torrents really are the best. Thanx.
I love the 700mb files! Don't make them smaller please. Great quality! Thanks eztv, keep it up!

@wwwired    You people make me sick, bitching about something that is free. Not only that but you complain about something you either A. Have not seen or B. Are completely ignorant about. Either way you are the biggest douche here.
EZTV     Thank you, you are the fucking man. If I could send you money on a weekly basis I fucking would!

@jsnundqui - @WTFsht - yea, my bad, this is two hours long and not one so the size is right and along the lines of the 350 MiB per hour.

@Jonathan.Bacon - foul language is not permitted on the TPB. Govern yourself accordingly. You should also keep your comments to torrents and not to individuals on TPB.
This is two hours long and not one so ignore my previous & ignorant comments about size - Great torrent - thanx much eztv!
